attributes.action: reduce prices on soft drinks in pubs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Dear Prime Minister, please encourage pubs to reduce the prices on soft drinks. Its only reasonable to look at the price differences to understand what encourages drink driving. You don't need to increase tax on alcohol in pubs to find a solution- they are struggling enough. Just offer pub clients better value to offer them a realistic choice not to buy alcohol.
